message.body: Joe, I emailed a 1/2 day PTO request for Monday afternoon. Let me know if it's approved.

It is approved.
I would rather you take a full day, but that is just my opinion. I have never been a fan of 1/2 day pto since I am not sure how product

ive anyone can be in 4 hours.
1/2 day is fine. Actually I believe the Gemino policy now allows 2 increments.
Enjoy the time off.
If you'd rather I take a full day (and since I have taxes to wrap up and a deck to stain) is it okay if I take the full day?
It is your call. The company policy allows for 4 hours, 2 hours as well as full day PTO. If you want to take a full day you can. If you want a half day t

hat is fine as well. Just let me know how much time you will be taking.
